General.Name: Strategem Capital Corp
General.Description: Strategem Capital Corporation, an investment holding company, invests in resource exploration and development, mining, energy production, and agricultural protein products in Canada. The company was formerly known as Dexton Technologies Corporation and changed its name to Strategem Capital Corporation in November 2001. Strategem Capital Corporation was incorporated in 1994 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 240 11 Avenue SW, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2R 0C3

2.Name: Dr. John  Waterer Ph.D.
